resources.string: Welcome tO Sylhet. Here i am your assistent. Order me what do you want. i am always ready for you.
Dear sir, I am always ready to serve you. See, Here are tow Options. Choose what you have wanted to know.
Thanks for choosing FoodWorld option.Here you can see three options. Select one which you want to do.
You are in manager section. Login by using your phone number and password. If you have no password, then register yourself by filling validation form. Thank You
